title: Simple XML Parser
description: Parse simplified XML structures with nested elements, text content, and tag matching validation. Educational example for understanding tree-based parsing.

motivation.why: XML remains important for enterprise systems, document formats, and configuration files. Understanding XML parsing helps with many real-world data interchange scenarios.

inputFormat.description: Simple XML with opening tags <name>, closing tags </name>, and self-closing tags <name />. Text content between tags. No attributes or namespaces in this simplified version.

outputFormat.description: The parser returns XmlNode enum values representing elements, text, or empty elements, with validation results.

XmlNode.description: Enum: Element { name, children, text }, Text(String), EmptyElement { name }

validation.description: Returns valid/invalid status with error messages
